title: I Busted 50 Myths in Chapter 3!
author: Melt
description:
I busted 50 of the craziest myths in the new Fortnite Chapter 3, yes I actually did 50 so make sure you watch until the end so you don't miss any of the myths!

SUBSCRIBE OR I'LL TAKE YOUR V BUCKS

Say hi to me on these!:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LG_Melts
Instagram: Bennett.Melt 
Twitch.TV/Meltards
Tik Tok: lgmelt
MY DISCORD!: https://discord.com/invite/FUFdkK8
Creator Code: Melts - ad

Guy Who Fished For Midas Flopper: https://www.youtube.com/c/Carter2k

3rd Glitch By: OrangeGuy

TimeCodes:
0:00 - Tents Stop Fall Damage
0:09 - Intro
0:13 -Glide Speed Boost
0:23 - Invisible Barriers On Map
0:40 - Trees can eliminate players
0:45 - You Can One Pump
0:51 - Cactus Hurt You
0:56 - Tents Break Steel Walls
1:08 - Trees Can Be Boats
1:21 - Sliding Stops Fall Damage
1:38 - Chapter 3 Is Pay To Win
1:55 - Trees Can Launch You
2:02 - You Can Slide Into Players Builds
2:16 - The Midas Flopper Is In Ch.3
2:33 - Quads Crashers Can Break Steel Walls
2:42 - You Can Zip Line While Knocked
2:49 - You Can Loot While Knocked
2:58 - Rocks Can Fall Like Trees
3:14  - Ziplines Stop Fall Damage
3:17 - You Can Slide Under Small Places
3:30 - Bushes Still Stop Fall Damage
3:37 - You Can Skybase In Ch.3
3:58 - You Can Become I.O Guards
4:00 - Mystique Still Tricks People
4:12 - You Can Put Tires On Quads
4:20 - Sliding Gives Jump Boost
4:35 - Chickens Open Vault
4:43 - Chillis Add Glide Jump Boost
5:04 - Trees Can Break Builds
5:11 - Trees Can Break Steel Builds
5:17 - You Can Still Quad Crash
5:33 - You Can Get Battle Pass
5:42 - Sliding Makes You Faster
6:05 - You Cam Get Banned For Teaming
6:31 - You Can Slide Underwater
6:39 - You Can Float With Tent
6:53 - Snipers Can Eliminate 2 People
7:03 - You Can Shoot Farther In Chapter 3
7:32 - You Can Eliminate Teammates
7:48 - You Can Slide While Carrying Someone
7:51 - You Can Slide And Shoot Backwards
8:00 - You Can Slide Under Sniper Shot
8:10 - Max Height Is Higher In Ch.3
8:39 - Midas Flopper Is In Ch.3
8:54 - Spiderwebs Stop Max Fall Damage
8:59 - You Can Trade Elims In Ch.3
9:18 - Snipers Can One Shot
9:26 - You Can Side Grade To Old Pump
9:36 - You Can Double Pump
9:49 - You Can Team With Randoms
10:08 - You Can Teleport With Boat
10:33 - You Can Play Ch.2 On Mobile

Content Strategist: Bazerk
